Name: Key Lime Pie #2
Instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled, rimmed glass. To make the pie rim, wipe outside edge of rim with cream mix and dip into crunched up Graham Cracker or digestive biscuits.
Review: Beautiful balance of pineapple, vanilla, sweet and sour.
Nutrition: One serving of Key Lime Pie #2 contains 160 calories
